titles.title: Aneurysm Awareness Act
To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a study with respect to aneurysms, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 2/13/2003--Introduced. Aneurysm Awareness Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a study and report to Congress on the following matters concerning aneurysms in the United States: (1) the incidence of aneurysms; (2) the most common signs and symptoms of aneurysms; and (3) the characteristics of individuals at the highest risk for aneurysms. Expresses the sense of the Congress that there should be an increased awareness of and research pertaining to aneurysms.
